\documentclass{standalone}
\usepackage{pgfplots}
\usepackage{tikz}
\usetikzlibrary{automata}
\usetikzlibrary {positioning}
%\pgfplotsset{compat=1.16}
\usepackage{raha_tikz}


\begin{document}
  \begin{tikzpicture}[scale=1.1]
    \begin{scope}
    \draw (-2,0) node[rond5,jaune] (a) {} node {$a$};
    \draw (0,2) node[rond5,jaune] (b) {} node {$b$};
    \draw (2,0) node[rond5,jaune] (c) {} node {$c$};
    \draw (1,-2) node[rond5,jaune] (d) {} node {$d$};
    \draw (-1,-2) node[rond5,jaune] (e) {} node {$e$};
    
    \draw (a) edge[-latex'] node[left] {$-1$} (b);
    \draw (b) edge[-latex'] node[left] {$3$} (c);
    \draw (c) edge[-latex'] node[left] {$-1$} (d);
    \draw (d) edge[-latex'] node[below] {$3$} (e);
    \draw (e) edge[-latex'] node[left] {$-1$} (a);
    \draw (e) edge[-latex'] node[left] {$-3$} (b);
    \draw (b) edge[-latex'] node[left] {$2$} (d);
    \end{scope}
\end{tikzpicture}
\end{document}
